medDesc: Our website provides an up-to-date list of medical facilities with full contact information that specialize in providing care for people with auditory disabilities.
specialtiesDesc: We provide a wide range of educational programmes specially adapted for the hearing impaired. Thanks to these unique programmes, people with hearing impairments can not only acquire literacy skills, but also have the opportunity to work in modern and in-demand fields.
studyDesc: Thanks to our Effafa project, people with auditory difficulties have the opportunity to learn literacy and sign language in a convenient online format on our website as well as offline at our Effafa Education Centre.
